name: Bubble Mouse City Adventure & Candy Shoppe Blast
name_original: Bubble Mouse City Adventure & Candy Shoppe Blast
description:
Pop bubbles by matching 3 or more of the same kind of bubble, and multiply your points by bouncing trick shots off the walls and making streaks of successful shots to discover new puzzles and locations. Watch out for cats and other obstacles that block your way – you must use your wits to knock out the bubbles above them. A variety of power-ups can help you through the game, but use them wisely! You may need them later in the game!

BUBBLE MOUSE (City Adventure)

Shoot bubbles to help Mayor Mouse save the city from mischievous cats!
• Play 98 puzzles and 6 locations in this addictive match 3 adventure
• Win FREE power-ups
• Score high to play the Bubble Ring mini-game
• Earn a Key to the City by completing all 6 locations

BUBBLE MOUSE BLAST (Candy Shoppe)

The cats have taken over the candy store with a new plan that’s more fiendish than ever!
• Shoot bubbles while candy and cakes advance towards your mouse hero
• Act fast, because that makeshift cannon can only hold an item for a few seconds
• Crush the competition with all-new power-ups and reach the top of the leaderboard
